differential_diagnosis: CNS infection (including viral, bacterial, and fungal causes)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Given the patient's history of allogeneic stem-cell transplantation and a gradual onset of altered mental status without acute fever, the leading diagnostic consideration was HHV-6–related encephalitis. Negative testing for common pathogens and the CSF analysis characterizing mild lymphocytosis supported this diagnosis, especially when HHV-6 was detected in subsequent testing.
